DataElement.preferredDefinition: Name (first, middle and last) of a patient.  _PN: A character string encoded using 5 component convention, each of 64 characters.  Components order is: Family name, Given Name, Middle Name, Prefix, Suffix.  "^" used to identify a null component. [Standard-based]

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Name (first, middle and last) of a patient.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: Personal names, given or surname, as cultural characteristics, as ethnological or religious patterns, as indications of the geographic distribution of families and inbreeding, etc. Analysis of isonymy, the quality of having the same or similar names, is useful in the study of population genetics. NAMES is used also for the history of names or name changes of corporate bodies, such as medical societies, universities, hospitals, government agencies, etc.

Concepts.definition: A word or group of words indicating the identity of a person usually consisting of a first (personal) name and a last (family) name with an optional middle name. In some cultural traditions the family name comes first.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Events, people, materials and activities uniquely defined by medical imaging.
ConceptualDomain.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine

DataElementConcept.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 12/7/08 - released per Emily Honeycutt/Duke Clinical Research Institute

In some cultural traditions the family name comes first.:The words or language units by which a thing is known.

Concepts.definition: Containing as much or as many as is possible or normal.

A word or group of words indicating the identity of a person usually consisting of a first (personal) name and a last (family) name with an optional middle name. In some cultural traditions the family name comes first.
The words or language units by which a thing is known.
